data.name: Alien worm
data.detailed_description:
Alien swarm is a roguelike game with action elements.

You have to control an underground worm and destroy soldiers and various military equipment, but be careful, the military is hunting you! Fly out of the ground at the most unexpected moment and hit the enemies! Kill, destroy and earn points, try to set a record.
Do you think it will be easy? No matter how it is - the armies of the military in helicopters and cars will do everything possible to stop you!
Upgrade your worm skills and try to set a record every time! Good luck in battle!

Features:
- Character leveling;
- Graphics in the form of an old movie;
- Exciting atmosphere.

data.short_description: Welcome to an incredibly atmospheric game in which you have to control an alien underground worm and kill everything that moves!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GSO 512
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GSO 1024
